name: com.brunomikoski.scriptableobjectcollection
description: A library to help improve the usability of Unity3D Scriptable Objects by grouping them into a collection and exposing them by code or nice inspectors!

samples.description: This sample shows how you can leverage the ScriptableObjectCollection to create a collection that is managed by the Addressables system. Allowing you to update it on the fly and also show some of the new features of the 2.3.1 version
